Short-term plan:
- Maintain central pressure, grow safely with the apple at (5,8), and weave to force SNAKE #0 toward the top-left while preserving escape routes.
- If the opportunity to force a head-on arises later with a real lead, execute it, but avoid reckless exchanges when tied on score.
